Plot: A man who escapes from the vicious grips of the serial killer known as "The Collector" is blackmailed to rescue an innocent girl from the killer's booby-trapped warehouse.
Title: The Collection
Writer: Patrick Melton, Marcus Dunstan, Patrick Melton (characters), Marcus Dunstan (characters)
Actors: Josh Stewart, Emma Fitzpatrick, Christopher McDonald, Lee Tergesen
tomatoConsensus: The Collection offers more grisly thrills and twisted humor than its predecessor; in other words, fun for genre fans, but unpleasant for anyone else.
